title: Harvey Slumfenburger's Christmas Present
description: Back by popular demand — in a new midi edition! Santa finds a forgotten present — and is determined to deliver it himself.One Christmas Eve after the reindeer are asleep, Santa sees a present still in the sack — Harvey Slumfenburger’s present. And so he starts a very long journey on foot . . . by plane . . . on skis . . . and so on until he reaches Harvey’s hut, slides down the chimney, and delivers the last Christmas present, safe and sound.
author: John Burningham
